The Hongxing Wangsheng Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Lingshi County, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Lingshi Hongxing Wangsheng Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Lingshi Hongxing Wangsheng Coal Industry Company, which is a subsidiary of Lingshi Hongxing Energy Company.
